document.full_text: swiss commodity trader glencore has lined up buyers for all of the shares in its planned $11 billion mega-float only a day into the sale process, two sources close to the deal said.
document.title: investors seen rushing for a slice of glencore ipo
lines_and_colors: swiss commodity trader glencore has lined up buyers for all of the shares in its planned $11 billion mega-float only a day into the sale process, two sources close to the deal said.
